channel.title: CVE Feed for Toshiba Lighting & Technology Corporation -- Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Toshiba Lighting & Technology Corporation -- Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A

item.title: CVE-2017-2237|2024-08-05T13:48:04.355Z -- toshiba%20lighting%20%26%20technology%20corporation -- toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw16a
item.description: Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A firmware HEM-GW16A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier. Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW26A firmware HEM-GW26A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier allows an attacker to execute arbitrary OS commands via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-2238|2024-08-05T13:48:05.058Z -- toshiba%20lighting%20%26%20technology%20corporation -- toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw16a
item.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A firmware HEM-GW16A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier and Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW26A firmware HEM-GW26A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-2236|2024-08-05T13:48:05.063Z -- toshiba%20lighting%20%26%20technology%20corporation -- toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw16a
item.description: Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A firmware HEM-GW16A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier, Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW26A firmware HEM-GW26A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier uses hard-coded credentials, which may allow attackers to perform operations on device with administrative privileges.

item.title: CVE-2017-2235|2024-08-05T13:48:04.342Z -- toshiba%20lighting%20%26%20technology%20corporation -- toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw16a
item.description: Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A firmware HEM-GW16A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier. Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW26A firmware HEM-GW26A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier allows an attacker to bypass access restriction to change the administrator account password via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-2234|2024-08-05T13:48:04.501Z -- toshiba%20lighting%20%26%20technology%20corporation -- toshiba%20home%20gateway%20hem-gw16a
item.description: Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW16A firmware HEM-GW16A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier, Toshiba Home gateway HEM-GW26A firmware HEM-GW26A-FW-V1.2.0 and earlier may allow remote attackers to access a non-documented developer screen to perform operations on device with administrative privileges.
